name: Autocomplete NextGenAPI Address
author: NextGenAPI

sections.description: Autocomplete a street or a city or a post code or any combination of the street/ post code/ city using NextGenAPI address service. Currently only German addresses are supported.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
How does it work ?

NextGenAPI priovides service to query/ autocomplete street/ postal code/ city.
This plugin uses the servive and jquery easy autocomplete javascript to provide autocomplete features.

Should I configure all the fields ?

No, you only need to configure the fields you use. Please note the following default values used incase the field is not configured.

Street ==> ”
City ==> ”
Postal Code ==> ”
Country ==> DE

Why don’ I get addresses for my country ?

Please be aware, currently the following countries are supported.

  • Germany

Please checkback for updates about new countries added.

Is this a paid plugin?

No, It’s totally free. No paid version is available.

short_description: This plugin helps to Autocomplete any Germany Address using NextGenAPI.
description: Autocomplete a street or a city or a post code or any combination of the street/ post code/ city using NextGenAPI address service. Currently only German addresses are supported.
